name: CupertinoDialogAction
desc: A button typically used in a [CupertinoAlertDialog].

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: The callback that is called when the button is tapped or otherwise activated.

fields.name: isDefaultAction
fields.desc: Set to true if button is the default choice in the dialog.

fields.name: isDestructiveAction
fields.desc: Whether this action destroys an object.

fields.name: textStyle
fields.desc: [TextStyle] to apply to any text that appears in this button.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of CupertinoDialogAction
desc: 【isDefaultAction】: Whether it is a default action 【bool】
【isDestructiveAction】: Whether it is a destructive action 【bool】
